faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How does the credit system work?
faq.a1: Credits are consumed when you use AI features. Each plan includes monthly credits that reset every billing cycle.
faq.q2: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan?
faq.a2: Yes, you can change your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately.
faq.a3: No setup fees. You only pay the monthly subscription for your chosen plan.
faq.a4: Yes, we provide email support for all plans, with priority support for Pro and Premium users.
faq.q5: Does NexusOne work in other languages?
faq.a5: Yes! We support 5 languages: English, Spanish, Portuguese, Arabic, and Hebrew with full RTL support.
faq.a6: Yes, we use bank-level encryption and follow security best practices. We are GDPR compliant.

testimonials.content_1: NexusOne increased our conversion rate by 340% in just 3 months. The WhatsApp automation alone paid for the entire subscription.
testimonials.content_2: The dropshipping integration is perfect. I import products and create campaigns in minutes. We've made $50k in the first month.
testimonials.content_3: Finally a platform that delivers on its promises. The multilingual support was key for our global growth.

docs.platform_description: NexusOne is a comprehensive AI-powered marketing automation platform that integrates content generation, social media management, campaign building, and analytics into one unified system.
docs.getting_started_desc: New to NexusOne? Start with our quick setup guide to get your marketing automation running in minutes.
docs.modules_description: Explore our comprehensive suite of marketing automation modules designed to scale your business.
docs.pricing_description: Choose the plan that fits your business needs and budget.
docs.credit_system_desc: NexusOne uses a credit-based system for AI-powered features. Each action consumes credits based on complexity and resource usage.
docs.api_description: Integrate NexusOne's powerful features into your existing workflow with our comprehensive REST API.
docs.api_key_info: Get your API key from your account settings. Keep it secure and never share it publicly.
docs.api_version_info: All API requests should use version 1. We maintain backward compatibility across minor updates.
docs.integrations_description: NexusOne seamlessly connects with leading platforms and services to streamline your marketing workflow.
docs.custom_integrations_desc: Need a specific integration? Our team can build custom connectors for your business needs.
docs.support_description: Get help when you need it with our comprehensive support options.
docs.multilingual_support: Our support team provides assistance in multiple languages to serve our global community.
docs.satisfaction_guarantee_desc: We're committed to your success. If you're not satisfied with our service, we'll work with you to make it right.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your data.
privacy.highlight_1: We never sell your personal data
privacy.highlight_2: All data is encrypted with bank-level security
privacy.highlight_3: You control your data and can delete it anytime
privacy.highlight_6: Regular security audits and compliance checks
privacy.intro_text_1: NexusOne ("we," "our," or "us") respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy describes how we collect, use, store, and share your information when you use our AI-powered marketing automation platform.
privacy.intro_text_2: By using NexusOne, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy. If you do not agree with this policy, please do not use our services.
privacy.intro_important: This policy is available in multiple languages. In case of conflicts between versions, the English version takes precedence.
privacy.account_info_1: Name, email address, and contact details
privacy.content_data_1: Marketing campaigns and content you create
privacy.content_data_2: Customer data you upload or import
privacy.service_provision_4: Improve our services and user experience
privacy.communication_3: Share product news and feature updates
privacy.security_intro: We implement industry-leading security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
privacy.technical_measures_4: Secure data centers with physical security
privacy.sharing_intro: We do not sell your personal data. We only share information with trusted partners who help us provide our services.
privacy.service_providers_desc: We work with carefully vetted third parties to provide specific services:
privacy.legal_requirements_desc: We may disclose information when required by law or to protect our rights and the safety of our users.
privacy.rights_intro: You have several rights regarding your personal data under GDPR, CCPA, and other privacy laws.
privacy.access_rights_1: Request a copy of your personal data
privacy.access_rights_2: Review how your data is being used
privacy.access_rights_3: Download your data in a portable format
privacy.exercise_rights_desc: To exercise any of these rights, contact our privacy team. We'll respond within 30 days.
privacy.retention_intro: We retain your data only as long as necessary to provide our services and comply with legal obligations.
privacy.transfers_intro: Your data may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place.
privacy.contact_intro: If you have questions about this privacy policy or our data practices, please contact us.
privacy.response_time: We aim to respond to all privacy inquiries within 72 hours during business days.
privacy.changes_intro: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by email and through our platform.
privacy.notification_method: Continued use of our services after policy changes constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.
privacy.footer_text: Have questions about privacy? We're here to help.
